1.content: You had got off the train a few minutes ago. The town it had left you in wasn't that big and so you had quickly reach your destination. Your mom had had to leave the house for a month because of her work. Because she was so worried about you, even though you were already 17, she had decided that you would spend the time in one of her friend's house. Of course she had just given you the address. And here you were : in front of a
1.title: where are you ?

choices: Normal food in a normal plate
Dog food in a normal plate
12.content:
... a kennel ! The heck was that ? You were supposed to live in a kennel for a month ? You stood there for a minute, fazed with this prospect. Still you rang the bell. It's not like you had anywhere else to go. While you waited at the door you actually noticed that there was no dog to be heard. But that was to be expected as it was sunday. You waited for one minute before you finally saw someone coming out to greet you :
"Good evening. Who might you be ?"
"Hello I'm Sarah, Julie's daughter. She told me I was supposed to spent a month at your house."
"Oh yeah, Sarah of course. Come in I'll show you around."
You obeyed her and followed.
"My name is Maria, so call me just that. Now I'm sure you noticed, but I run a kennel and we, me my daughters and you now, live in the back. It's a really nice place you'll see." she told you as she leaded you through the kennel before opening a door to what looked like a normal living room.
"Here we are. My room and the girls' are upstairs. Right now, they are sleeping by friends of their so you'll meet them tomorrow. Do you want to eat something ?"
"If it doesn't bother you..."
"Oh it doesn't." she said as she gave you...
12.title: kennel

choices: in the room of one of my daughters
in a box of the kennel
121.content:
... a plate.
"You like pasta right ?"
"Who doesn't, you joked."
"True, she answered as she served you."
You actually were very hungry from the trip, so you immediatly started to eat.
"You know, we actually don't have a lot of space here, she said as she was watching you eating, so you'll be sleeping...
121.title: Normal food in a normal plate

1211.content:
"... in the living room. Is that alright with you ?"
You swallowed then answered :
"No problem. I sleep on the sofa ?"

She nodded. "Now if you excuse me, I'll go to sleep. It's getting pretty late and I begin early tomorrow. Now that I think about it, do you want to assist my lesson ? If you do, I'll wake you up tomorrow."

You thought a little about it then answered : "Okay. I don't really have anything to do since it's the hollyday for me."

"I know, it's also the case for my daughters actually. Thus, they help me with the lessons."

"Nice. I'll be able to meet them then."

She nooded again.
"Now you should also go to bed, we begin early tomorrow."

You agreed, and after you're both done cleaning the table, you went on the sofa that had been prepared for you and fell asleep.
1211.title: in the living room

1212.title: in the room of one of my daughters

choices: ask her if this is a joke
124.content: Here You Go Sarah you cute little doggie here is your dog food you asked for
124.title: dog food in a bowl

1241.content:
after you eat it she asks you


''ill give you 2 choices be my dog or...
1241.title: eat it

info.brief_description: You have to spend time with someone, and he decided you should spend it as a dog
info.description:
everything's explained in the first chapter so just a few rules here :

-no death
-no gore
-no vore
-no humiliation
-no other transformation than doglike
=>it can be either mental, physical, hypnosis or whatever you want as long as it is dog transformation
